title: Death to Capitalism? Visitors To Marx's Grave Balk at Fee
text:
Published By: Wall Street Journal - Today 
Karl Marx is buried in a London cemetery that charges an entry fee to fund conservation of the grounds. Now, the charge is infuriating a new...
